name: Ted Strayer
descriptions: Ted Strayer is a wasteland vagabond who decided to become a Rivet City resident in 2277.
Ted has spend most of his life wandering the wasteland.
A recent arrival to Rivet City, he spends his time in the common room, just hanging around, until he decides where to go next.

His father Jeff Strayer was a mercenary, who before passing was a part of a five person expedition to Fort Constantine. The expedition was successful and it allowed him to accumulate a small fortune. However events of this expedition led him to become a target by another former member, Mister Crowley.

He can be found in the Capitol Preservation Society in the afternoon. Furthermore, he frequents The Muddy Rudder bar and the common room between 4 and 6 a.m., along with wandering around the flight deck from noon to 2 p.m.

topics.response_text: Dude, you got your key. What do you want now?

topics.topic: MS03RCHistory1Could I ask you about Rivet City's history?
topics.topic_text: Can I ask you about Rivet City's history?
topics.response_text: Dude, I only just got here, myself. Ain't nothing I could tell you.

topics.topic_text: Do you know a Mister Crowley?
topics.response_text: Whoa! That's a blast from the past.

topics.topic_text: I'm here to kill you, and there's nothing you can do about it.
topics.response_text: What! No, please! I'm begging you.

topics.topic_text: I'll give you 25 caps for that key.
topics.response_text: Oh, yeah! I'm gonna be flying high tonight.

topics.topic_text: I've learned what I came for. Thank you.
topics.response_text: No sweat, man. I'm just chilling out here for a while.

topics.topic_text: Thanks for the info. I'm just trying to sort all of this out.
topics.response_text: No problem dude. Thanks for not offing me.

topics.topic_text: Give me that key. I'd hate to see you bleed to death.
topics.response_text: Uh...sure, dude. I don't know what it's for anyway. Don't need to get all thug like.

topics.topic_text: Just give me the key. Don't ask why.
topics.response_text: Okay, dude, Don't have a cow. Here, take it.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Tenpenny?
topics.response_text: Everybody knows he runs Tenpenny Tower, but I never met the dude. I swear!

topics.topic_text: Mister Crowley wants your father's security key.
topics.response_text: Whoa! Is it, like, worth caps? Cause I got needs, man.

topics.topic_text: Do you know what they were doing at the fort?
topics.response_text: Nah. He said that old man Tenpenny hired him and some other guys to go in there, but he never said why.

topics.topic_text: Are you sure you can't think of any reason he might want you dead?
topics.response_text: Like I told you, man. I never met the dude. Why would he want me dead?
All right! You and me, just hangin'.

topics.topic_text: Do you actually do anything here in Rivet City?
topics.response_text: You mean, like fix stuff? Nah.

topics.topic_text: I know your type. You're a freeloader and a waste of breath.
topics.response_text: Whoa! Dude! You don't have to get all in my face.
No point in getting all worked up. I get three squares, I got a place to crash, and nothings trying to eat me.
No way, dude. Like I said. I need the caps.

conversation.response_text: So dude, did that key ever get you anything?
Dude, that would be such a drag. Last resort, man. Last resort.
